words.name: Ointment
words.descr: a thick substance, usually containing medicine, that is put on the skin where it is sore or where there is an injury, in order to cure it.

words.name: first aid kit
words.descr: a box or bag containing basic medical equipment such as bandages and antiseptic cream.

words.name: Needle
words.descr: a very thin, hollow, pointed piece of metal that is connected to a syringe and used to take blood from the body or to put drugs or medicine in.

words.name: Plaster
words.descr: a small piece of sticky cloth or plastic that you use to cover and protect a cut in the skin.

words.name: Bandage
words.descr: a long, narrow piece of cloth that is tied around an injury or a part of someone's body that has been hurt.

words.name: Cat

words.name: Dog
words.descr: a long, narrow piece of cloth that is tied around an injury or a part of someone's body that has been hurt.
